story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Pizoo was born from a simple belief: everyone deserves to find love. In a world where dating apps felt more like a chore than an adventure, we wanted to create something different.
story.paragraph2: We combined cutting-edge AI technology with genuine human understanding to build a platform that actually works. Today, millions of people trust Pizoo to help them find their perfect match.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Download the Pizoo app from the App Store or Google Play, then follow the simple registration process. You'll need to provide basic information and add a few photos.

questions.question: Is Pizoo free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! Pizoo offers a free tier with basic features. We also offer premium subscriptions with additional features like unlimited likes and advanced filters.

questions.question: What makes Pizoo different from other dating apps?
questions.answer: Pizoo uses advanced AI technology to provide better matches based on compatibility, not just appearance. We also prioritize safety and authenticity.

questions.question: How do I edit my profile?
questions.answer: Go to your profile, tap the edit icon, and update your information. Don't forget to save your changes!

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes, you can delete your account at any time from Settings > Account > Delete Account. Please note this action is permanent.

questions.question: How do I verify my profile?
questions.answer: Profile verification is available in Settings. Take a selfie following the on-screen instructions, and we'll review it within 24 hours.

questions.question: How does the matching algorithm work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes your preferences, interests, and behavior to find compatible matches. The more you use Pizoo, the better your matches become.

questions.question: Can I undo a swipe?
questions.answer: Yes! Premium members can undo unlimited swipes. Free users get 3 rewinds per day.

questions.question: How do I report inappropriate behavior?
questions.answer: Tap the three dots on any profile or message, then select 'Report'. We take all reports seriously and will take appropriate action.

questions.question: Is my data safe?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption to protect your data. Read our Privacy Policy for more details.

questions.question: Can I block someone?
questions.answer: Yes, you can block any user by going to their profile and selecting 'Block'. They won't be able to see your profile or contact you.

questions.question: How do you verify profiles?
questions.answer: We use photo verification, AI detection, and manual review to ensure profiles are authentic.

questions.question: What's included in Premium?
questions.answer: Premium includes unlimited likes, rewinds, advanced filters, read receipts, and more. Check our pricing page for details.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime from your account settings or through the App Store/Google Play.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: Refund policies vary by platform. Contact support@pizoo.ch for assistance with refund requests.
